contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox |image = Heliobolus lugubris.jpeg |image_caption = ''[[Heliobolus lugubris]]'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Lacertidae]] | genus = '''''Heliobolus''''' |genus_authority = Fitzinger, 1843 }} '''''Heliobolus''''' is a [[genus]] of lizards of the [[family (biology)|family]] [[Lacertidae]]. Species include:<ref name=tax>[http://taxonomicon.taxonomy.nl/TaxonTree.aspx?id=640327 Genus ''Heliobolus''.] The Taxonomicon.</ref> *''[[Heliobolus lugubris]]'' *''[[Heliobolus neumanni]]'' *''[[Heliobolus nitida]]'' *''[[Heliobolus spekii]]'' ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Lacertidae]] {{Lacertidae-stub}}
